id: consumer:dodgers vs blue jays game 7 tonight how to watch the 2025 ml:2025-11-01T23:55:14.000Z
title: Dodgers vs. Blue Jays, Game 7 tonight: How to watch the 2025 MLB World Series without cable
author: Danica Creahan,Liz Kocan
summary_long: The World Series is headed to a Game 7 after the Los Angeles Dodgers tied up the series against the Toronto Blue Jays last night, 3-3. The Fall Classic remains on Toronto's home turf for Game 7 tonight — Saturday, Nov. 1 — at 8PM ET/5PM PT. The World Series odds still favor the Dodgers. Source: www.engadget.com. Date: 2025-11-01. Why it matters: outline likely impact on technology, business, or society. What’s next: note near-term developments or signals to watch.

id: bigtech:inside the marketplace for vaccine medical exemptions:2025-11-01T11:15:57.000Z
title: Inside the marketplace for vaccine medical exemptions
author: Michael Schulson, Undark
summary_long: Maybe a client hears about them in the comment section of the Facebook group “Medical Exemption Accepted,” or on the r/unvaccinated forum on Reddit. Maybe it’s through an interview posted on the video-sharing platform Rumble. Or maybe it’s the targeted advertisements on Google: “We do medical exemptions.” Cassandra Clerkin, a mother in upstate New York, first got in touch with Frontline Health Advocates near the start of the 2024–2025 school year, after hearing they had doctors who would write exemptions from school immunization requirements. One of Clerkin’s children, she said, had suffered seizures after receiving a vaccine. Source: arstechnica.com. Date: 2025-11-01. Why it matters: outline likely impact on technology, business, or society. What’s next: note near-term developments or signals to watch.

id: space:live coverage commercial space station demo data center prec:2025-11-01T21:42:33.000Z
title: Live coverage: Commercial space station demo, data center precursor to launch on SpaceX Bandwagon mission
author: Will Robinson-Smith
summary_long: An Nvidia-backed data center demo, a testbed for Vast’s future commercial space station and artificial intelligence-powered weather satellites are among the spacecraft flying on SpaceX’s latest Bandwagon ride share mission to low Earth orbit. Bandwagon-4, is the fourth multi-customer flight to a mid-inclination orbit and the 18th mission as part of SpaceX’s small sat ride share program, which also includes the Transporter series, going to higher inclinations. Liftoff from pad 40 at Cape Canaveral Space Force Station is set for 1:09:59 a.m. EDT (0509:59 UTC). Source: spaceflightnow.com. Date: 2025-11-01. Why it matters: outline likely impact on technology, business, or society. What’s next: note near-term developments or signals to watch.

id: consumer:pentagon will reportedly award spacex a 2 billion contract t:2025-11-01T21:00:19.000Z
title: Pentagon will reportedly award SpaceX a $2 billion contract to help develop the 'Golden Dome'
author: Jackson Chen
summary_long: SpaceX will reportedly receive a $2 billion contract to develop satellites for the US government, according to the Wall Street Journal. The WSJ's report detailed that SpaceX will be tasked with developing up to 600 satellites that can track missiles and aircraft and will be used for President Trump's proposed "Golden Dome" project. Announced back in May, the president introduced a project to build an anti-missile defense system that would intercept missile attacks before reaching their target. The Golden Dome is reminiscent of Israel's Iron Dome system, but the Pentagon has yet to reveal concrete details about the project. Source: www.engadget.com. Date: 2025-11-01. Why it matters: outline likely impact on technology, business, or society. What’s next: note near-term developments or signals to watch.

title: GitHub Game Off 2025 theme announcement
author: Lee Reilly
summary_long: Get ready for the annual Game Off, our month-long game jam that has inspired thousands of developers to make, share, and play games since 2012.
